meaningMnemonic: This kanji looks like and means the same thing as the radical, which makes it particularly easy to remember.
readingMnemonic: Remember the thousand people going down the slide on a cross in the radical 千? Turns out each one of them was carrying a <kanji>thousand</kanji> <reading>cen</reading>ts (せん). Go ahead and try to calculate what a thousand times a thousand cents would come out to. It's quite a lot, actually.
